Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers

Class PeriodController

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.PeriodController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/period") public class PeriodController extends Object
Controller for handling HTTP requests related to periods. It uses PeriodService to interact with the business logic layer.

      public PeriodController()

  • Method Details

    • getPeriods

      @GetMapping public List<PeriodResponseDtoFindAll> getPeriods()
      Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve all periods. PeriodService.getAllPeriods() to fetch a list of periods.
      Returns:
      PeriodResponseDtoFindAll representing the periods.

    • createPeriod

      @PostMapping public PeriodResponseDto createPeriod(@RequestBody PeriodBodyDto body, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long idUser)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new period.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user id.
      body - PeriodBodyDto.
      Returns:
      A PeriodResponseDto representing the newly created period.

    • getOpenPeriods

      @GetMapping("/open") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PeriodResponseDto>> getOpenPeriods()
      Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve all open periods. PeriodService.getAllPeriods() to fetch a list of open periods.
      Returns:
      PeriodResponseDtoFindAll representing the open periods.

    • getFilteredPeriods

      @GetMapping("/page") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<PeriodResponseDtoList>> getFilteredPeriods(@RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer year, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer month, @RequestParam(required=false) String state)
      Parameters:
      size - the number of items per page (default value is 10)
      page - the page number to retrieve (default value is 0)
      year - the year of the period
      month - the month of the period
      state - the expense state
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a paginated list

    • closePeriod

      @PutMapping("/close/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> closePeriod(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long idUser)
      Closes the specified period by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the period to be closed.
      idUser - the user id.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with status 203 if successful, or 500 in case of an error.

    • updatePeriod

      @PutMapping("/update/{period-id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updatePeriod(@PathVariable("period-id") Long periodId, @RequestBody PeriodBodyDto body, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long idUser)
      Endpoint to update the end date of an existing period in the system.
      Parameters:
      periodId - The unique identifier of the period to be updated.
      body - The body containing the new end date for the period.
      idUser - The identifier of the user who is making the update.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity .

    • getFuturePeriod

      @GetMapping("future") public FuturePeriodDTO getFuturePeriod()
      Endpoint to retrieve the next available period in "month/year" format.
      Returns:
      A string representing the next available period in "month/year" format.
